snippet: Aug. 28 will be the 50th anniversary of the mass protest that helped energize some of the most critical social legislation in the nation’s history and inspired a generation of activists. We want to hear from people who were there.
lead_paragraph: Aug. 28 will be the 50th anniversary of the mass protest that helped energize some of the most critical social legislation in the nation’s history and inspired a generation of activists. We want to hear from people who were there.

headline.main: What Are Your Memories of the March on Washington?
